dct_title_s: Map of Southern Oregon and Northern California
dct_description_sm: by N. Scholfield, Civil Engineer ; lith. by J.W. Hartman San Francisco.
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, settlements, roads.
Features "Western Line of the Gold Country."
"Entered according to act of Congress, in June A. 1851, By Nathan Scholfield, in the Clerks office of the District Court for the Northern District of California."
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
